website_summaries.verdict: Super cute and small. It is a workable alternative to carrying your cell phone in an arm band.
pros: More comfortable to wear than a running belt
Includes a second slot to hold your ID and key
Doesn't bounce around while you are running
cons: This backpack is best for short runs
It does not have a bladder or space to store your water bottle

customer_reviews.title: Barely noticeable
customer_reviews.text: Barely noticeable on my upper back. Carry my big cell phone with me in case of emergencies. Has two pockets. The smaller one can fit credit card sized items. Second pocket can fit a cell phone the size of a galaxy 8
customer_reviews.author: D. Rosales

customer_reviews.title: this is the perfect solution for me
customer_reviews.text: As someone that dislikes running belts, this is the perfect solution for me. Fits my Pixel 2 XL comfortably along with my keys so now I no longer have to worry about things bouncing around.
customer_reviews.author: Nhat

customer_reviews.title: Hardly Notice It's There
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for going for an outdoor run. Fits even the larger sized phones and can still fit a key, credit card, ID, etc. very easily in the extra pocket. I don't feel it bouncing around ever, except for the size adjustment strap on the front. But I just loop it around something and it usually stays put. Perfect for those who don't like bulky arm bands.
customer_reviews.author: Allison S

customer_reviews.title: iPhone and iPod f8t perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The pack works great. I use it backwards though. I do this so I can reach my itouch when I mow the lawn. When I wear it on my chest it fits fairly securely and have immediate access to my stuff should I wish to change songs or make adjustments. When I’m walking etc I wear it in the normal fashion
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Great for my HUGE S9+ phone
customer_reviews.text: I could not find a way to run with my new Samsung S9+, it was too big and heavy for arm or belt holders. This little backpack is padded to protect the phone and is the perfect size. Adjustable straps are comfy and do not bother me when running with just tank top. Meaning there are no sharp seams or any coarse straps to rub when jogging. The straps are adjustable although I had to tape mine so they would stay and not slide because the plastic piece does not prevent slippage.
customer_reviews.author: Erica White

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, I forget to take it off after my run!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! It is very comfortable. Sometimes I forget to take it off after my run! Large pocket that easily fits my samsung galaxy 8 plus. Ran in the rain yesterday and I was soaked, but my phone was gone dry. I think I will order a second for our vacation home because I can't live without it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: To the runners and bikers
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for a run, but by the end of the run I was ready for it to come off. It was a pain to run with a iphone plus so this is definitely helpful and has pockets for keys. Looking forward to using this when I bike. The one thing I'm a little worried about is the strips, they feel like they might stretch and I have it fit for the smallest it can go- Until then, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Fiitgem

customer_reviews.title: Bounces Around
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing more annoying to me than stuff bouncing on my body when I'm trying to run. This thing fit ok, but still bounced around when running. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: Great running pack
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for several hours over several weeks, and I can say it is exactly what I needed. It is easy to adjust and seems well made. The pack is big enough to hold my large Pixel 2xl phone while also being barley noticeable and super light. The smaller card pocket is a surprising convenient addition to hold my ID, insurance, and key. I would highly recommend this pack to any runner wanting a comfortable & safe way to keep their phone on them.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: could be better
customer_reviews.text: rides up your back too high and rides up your armpits too easily, other than that, i ran past alot of people HOLDING THEIR PHONES while running, which gets old fast
customer_reviews.author: samiam

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know I needed until I first used it.
customer_reviews.text: This is just the perfect accessory for my runs/jogs. It fits my iPhone 6s plus, and my house/car keys. I was able to attach a head light to the front of it and it helps with the visibility.
customer_reviews.author: AmB7

customer_reviews.title: Secure, fits large phone in defender case
customer_reviews.text: It fits my Pixel 2 XL in a Defender case. Keeps it close (for bluetooth) and out of harm's way when working. Doesn't require constant readjustment like the armbands.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and secure.
customer_reviews.text: I actually forget I'm wearing this sometimes. It fits my 6.3"phone just fine, giving me room for my house key and some cash (just in case my workout involves running to a store). It doesn't bounce around nor is it restrictive. Excellent investment.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Best Cell phone carrier for Runners!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my half marathon last weekend. It rained ,it was cold, but my cell phone never got wet and I felt comfortable wearing it all thru the race! A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Cole

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Straps are a little awkwardly placed, but product serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Jax

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Helpful, but not t easy to adjust. Fit may depend on your size.
customer_reviews.author: Rcine

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It fits both my phones (LG G7 ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It fits both my phones (LG G7 ThinQ and iPhone 8) as well as ID, credit cards and my house key. Perfect for hiking and running.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy wearing it and using it. It's comfy and not bulky. It feels like i'm wearing nothing and holds my essentials pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Yay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a christmas gift.Holds cell phones and keys.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lorenzana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my phone and keys. Allows me to run and workout hands free. I don't need to have a bulky bag just to carry a few items.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Used for first time on sprint intervals. Very comfortable fit. Phone easy to reach. I'd recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lara Bell

customer_reviews.title: Hands are free!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It keeps my hands free whole I walk my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Chinese Chick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my workouts or anytime I dont want to ...
customer_reviews.text: comfy and light. Perfect for my workouts or anytime I dont want to carry my phine and wallet
customer_reviews.author: tonya green

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Note 8 w/attached head phone jack
customer_reviews.text: Ok....looks really nice and fits well. However, it only DOES NOT hold my samsung note 8 WITH a plug in headphone. THE flap will not velcro closed, nor do the 3 headphone jack opeonins align with the phone jack...I will be sending this back...I was prepared to love it......but
customer_reviews.author: Page4

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing for shorter runs when you don't want or need to pack an entire belt.
customer_reviews.author: Em H.

product_meta.title: Gear Beast Running Backpack Vest Cell Phone and Accessories Holder Lightweight Pack Key Card ID Holder for Running Walking Cycling Fits iPhone X 8 7 6s 6 Plus Galaxy S9 Plus S9 S8 Plus S8 S7 Note 8
